Bart Van Itterbeeck

Hi, I'm Bart, currently a Developer at Artcore Society.
I've always been fascinated by technology and the internet, and I decided that I wanted to make the internet my workplace.

I have made some fun projects using WebGL, Canvas, Node.js and others. You can see some of my work here.
